title: Bloomberg Markets: Jacob, Lustbader on Developing Medications
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Jacob, Lustbader on Developing Medications
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Gary Jacob CEO Synergy Pharmaceuticals Dr. Ian Lustbader Clinical Associate Professor of Medicine NYU School of Medicine Discussing the business of developing new medications and drug pricing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
